title: Provide a small CPU-only pip package for CI testing
body_html: My team is blocked on upgrading 0.2 -> 0.3 due to inability to pip install PyTorch's 0.6GB package on travis-ci.org. Would it be possible to provide a small CPU-only package to facilitate CI testing of packages based on PyTorch? (Most CI services do not have GPUs.)
body_text: My team is blocked on upgrading 0.2 -> 0.3 due to inability to pip install PyTorch's 0.6GB package on travis-ci.org. Would it be possible to provide a small CPU-only package to facilitate CI testing of packages based on PyTorch? (Most CI services do not have GPUs.)
body: My team is blocked on upgrading 0.2 -> 0.3 due to inability to `pip install` PyTorch's 0.6GB package on travis-ci.org. Would it be possible to provide a small CPU-only package to facilitate CI testing of packages based on PyTorch? (Most CI services do not have GPUs.)
